channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- LXD
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- LXD

item.title: CVE-2023-49721|2024-08-02T22:01:25.700Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- lxd
item.description: An insecure default to allow UEFI Shell in EDK2 was left enabled in LXD. This allows an OS-resident attacker to bypass Secure Boot.

item.title: CVE-2023-49721|2024-02-14T21:57:40.878Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- lxd
item.description: An insecure default to allow UEFI Shell in EDK2 was left enabled in LXD. This allows an OS-resident attacker to bypass Secure Boot.
